Description of measure:
The type of organisation to which the data refer. Data are published for the following organisation types:
- England (aggregated data for all NHS Talking Therapies service providers)
- Commissioning Region
- Integrated Care Board (ICB)
- Subsection of Integrated Care Board (SubICB)
- NHS Talking Therapies service provider
Additional notes: For further information about NHS geographies, see https://www.ons.gov.uk/methodology/geography/ukgeographies/healthgeography#english-health-geography

Description of measure:
The Organisation Data Service (ODS) code of the organisation to which the data refer. Data are published for the following organisation types:
- England (aggregated data for all NHS Talking Therapies service providers)
- Commissioning Region
- Integrated Care Board (ICB)
- Subsection of Integrated Care Board (SubICB)
- NHS Talking Therapies service provider
Technical construction:
The SubICB for a referral is defined using the OrgIDComm field on the IDS101Referral table. Old codes (including CCG codes) are mapped to 2022/23 SubICB codes.

ICB and Commissioning Regions are derived from the SubICB code.

NHS Talking Therapies service provider is taken from the submitted OrgID_Provider field on IDS101Referral table, a mandatory dataset field in the Referral table
Additional notes: Organisation Data Service (ODS) reference data are available from https://odsportal.hscic.gov.uk/
